18#include "tools.h"
19
20static int lvremove_single(struct cmd_context *cmd, struct logical_volume *lv,
21 void *handle __attribute((unused)))
22{
23 struct logical_volume *origin;
24
25 /*
26 * If this is a sparse device, remove its origin too.
27 */
28 if (lv_is_cow(lv) && lv_is_virtual_origin(origin = origin_from_cow(lv)))
29 lv = origin;
30
31 if (!lv_remove_with_dependencies(cmd, lv, arg_count(cmd, force_ARG))) {
32 stack;
33 return ECMD_FAILED;
34 }
35
36 return ECMD_PROCESSED;
37}
38
39int lvremove(struct cmd_context *cmd, int argc, char **argv)
40{
41 if (!argc) {
42 log_error("Please enter one or more logical volume paths");
43 return EINVALID_CMD_LINE;
44 }
45
46 cmd->handles_missing_pvs = 1;
47
48 return process_each_lv(cmd, argc, argv, READ_FOR_UPDATE, NULL,
49 &lvremove_single);
50}
51
